entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
